_header: That was well on Saint Edmund seen
_description: St. Edmund and the Devil; Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
Yt was on sant Edmund seneTo qwom ye fend was full
                    kene…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…þat ledes to Ioy þat lastes ayAmen I red þat
                    we all say

BodAsh42.First Lines:
þat was on saynte Edmunde seneOn whaim te fende was full
                    kene…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat lastis euer more & aieAmen Amen i rede we
                    saie
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Þat was wel on seint Edmund seneOn whom þe fend was ful
                    kene…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat ledeþ to Ioye þat lasteþ ayAMEN I
                    rede þat we alle say. AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 276.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Þat was on Seynt Edmunde seneTil whome þe fende was ful
                    kene…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat fedes to ioy þat lastes ayAmen I rede þat
                    we alle say

CULDd11.First Lines:
& þat was wel on seynt Edmound seneon whom þe fend
                    was ful keneFor in his lyf wretin fynde weþat holi man & good
                    was he…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…þat lediþ to þe ioye þat lastiþ
                    ayAmen I rede þat we alle say
CULDd11.Note:
Division between this and preceding 4643 comes two lines later in this MS, so begins,
                    ‘For in his…’.

BLHar2391.First Lines: Þat was on saynt edmunde seneOn wham þe feind was full kene…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …þat lastis euer more & ayAmen amen I red we say
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica i post pasche (left margin, f. 187v), with “A tale” written below

MinULZ822.First Lines:
þat was wele one saynt Edmunde seneone wham þe fende was
                    full keneffor of hys lyfe wryten fynde we…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þat ledes vs to Ioy þat lastes ayAmen I rede we all
                    þus say

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þat wos well on seint emoune seneOn whom þe fend wos full
                    kene…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þat ledyth to þe ioy þat lestyth ayAmen I rede
                    we all say
